name: Peanut Butter RY4 Cookie | DEVELOPED
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
This is a tribute to Wayne Walker's Obsidian with a little twist.  We wanted to take his inspiration and create a peanut butter cookie version of his master creation.  Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 32 at https://youtu.be/jcgzqvZ-LSQ .
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/
author: Developed

reviews.text: I honestly like this recipe but for my tastes I would of liked more peanut butter it's well balanced and flavors blend well together I think lately I'm getting immune to Cappella sugar cookie I can't taste it anymore It could be the alcohol that's in it well done overall . Definitely a 5 star recipe I highly recommend this to any peanut butter lovers ü§é

Originally made the recipe as is, its delicious. A tobacco with a very present peanut butter, and i love what the coconut is doing in there. My only problem is that i cant handle vaping tpa RY4 for too long as it messes with my throat for some reason. Delicious flavor, but had to stop using it. Swapped with JF ry4 and this recipe is just as good. I got lucky there. Thanks again guys!

Even though it has been around for ages TPA is the perfect RY4 for this profile. Everything tastes well balanced, also i like the usage of the coconut trick with the pnut butter. Excellent job guys and thanks for sharing
Really enjoying this considering I don't like peanut Butter, it's a very mellow, nutty, smooth vape with slight hints of caramel on exhale. Excellent job üëç

Funny to me reading fadedjay1's review.  I tried this at low wattage, and I wasn't too happy, as the flavor seemed too weak.  I put it in a higher wattage atomizer, and I like it.  Definitely multiple layers of flavor.  The inhale is much lighter than I expected, and the exhale is deep and nutty, and the lingering taste is outstanding.  This is not a sweet vape, like many cookie mixes, more shortbread than sugar cookie, but feels buttery in the mouth.  Very nice mix guys.

2 days into this recipe and loving it. Vaping at 27 watts in a rdl/mtl setup. Picking up well balanced peanuts butter cookie with tobacco notes (specifically light leafy dessert tobacco(ry4)). I don‚Äôt get coconut at all but I get the sense it blends the mix and sweetens it at the watts I‚Äôm at. Perfect for fall.
